attributes.action: Lower the insurance cost for young drivers on cars and Vans
attributes.additional_details: Too many young drivers have to pay over the odds with cars or Vans compared to older people, which can be more of a risk on the road. Owning a van at such a young age I been wrongly overcharged, and received no help when I needed my car insurance. It's time to change this, its time to help young people and encourage them, instead of seeing it as an opportunity to make more money.
attributes.background: After going from paying £870 for car insurance in my second year I purchased a van to aid me in my work. The insurance cost shot up to £2300, plus another £420 after a woman in her 60's reversed into me. although the accident was not my fault it has massively affected my price.
